plot: One night a Masai herdsman hears the distant call of a woman who lived three million years ago, begging him to bring her back to the land of her birth.
title: A Lucy
plot_es: One night a Masai herdsman hears the distant call of a woman who lived three million years ago, begging him to bring her back to the land of her birth.
plot_en: One night a Masai herdsman hears the distant call of a woman who lived three million years ago, begging him to bring her back to the land of her birth.
